ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Work Boots *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They are in Unrest on the Ghost, which is in the basement.  They are really nice if you haven t seen the stats yet.  I think they are AC 8 +3 STR, +5 DEX.
ygData.messageBody:
Jeremy Pollack wrote:
>
> From: "Jeremy Pollack" <jpollack@...>
>
> Okay ... where are Dwarven Workboots? Unrest, right? Any idea where? In that
> basement? I've been to unrest exactly one time but as soon as my wizzie
> friend hits 29 I'm insisting that my group go there (fyi I play with a group
> of RL friends so we all play together) and kill stuff. The tail end of the
> group is a 22 cleric though so we are kinda spread out. (30 will be
> uber-hell for me as I've promised to stop leveling for a while and help them
> catch up. :) Feign Death will be nice for that).

They are in Unrest on the Ghost, which is in the basement. They
are really nice if you haven't seen the stats yet. I think they
are AC 8 +3 STR, +5 DEX. I traded a plat ring of opolla I found
in a store in Qeynos (cost me 3pp!) for them and a screaming mace.

Xilith
